sentences.en: A slender superstructure was dictated with gently sloping approaches rather than staircases.
sentences.cn: 细长的上部结构,带有微缓斜坡接坡,比布置阶梯为优.

sentences.en: And law as superstructure, also won't alter oneself economic basis.
sentences.cn: 而法律作为上层建筑, 也不会改变自己的经济基础.

sentences.en: As a finish coat on superstructure, in engine room, pump room, etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于上层建筑 、 发动机室 、 泵房等的面漆.

sentences.en: Cypress and redwood are seldom used in the superstructure of commercial greenhouses.
sentences.cn: 扁柏和美州红松很少用于商用温室的上部结构.

sentences.en: Interaction between foundation and superstructure has been analysised concretely with BEM theory.
sentences.cn: 利用边界元法对地基与上部结构相互作用做了较为具体的理论分析.

sentences.en: It is time for us to reform the superstructure.
sentences.cn: 现在我们的上层建筑非改不行.

sentences.en: Law is considered a part of this superstructure.
sentences.cn: 法律被认为是上层建筑的一部分.

sentences.en: Superstructure compressed air ( water supply 、 fire fighting 、 smoke detection ) piping to be done air - tightness test.
sentences.cn: 上层建筑压缩空气管系 ( 供水管、消防管、烟雾探测管 ) 密性试验.

sentences.en: Superstructure lifesaving and fire fighting equipment to be done inspection.
sentences.cn: 上层建筑救生、消防设备交验.

sentences.en: Superstructure will never serve the economic foundation, it is beyond doubt.
sentences.cn: 上层建筑永远服务于经济基础, 这一点是无可置疑的.

sentences.en: The effect of the superstructure to the nonlinear interaction is discussed.
sentences.cn: 本文深入分析了上部结构对非线性共同作用的影响.

sentences.en: The superstructure is constructed in marine grade light alloy.
sentences.cn: 主体结构由轻型合金构成.

sentences.en: The superstructure may be most safely reared on a good classic foundation.
sentences.cn: 建造在一流地基上的建筑物应该是最安全的.
资本主义的整个上层建筑

sentences.en: We might try to clear up some of the cabins in the superstructure.
sentences.cn: 我们可以设法清理出主甲板之上的一些船舱。

sentences.en: With the change of the economic foundation the entire immense superstructure is more or less rapidly transformed.
sentences.cn: 随着经济基础的变化,整个庞大的上层建筑也会不同程度地发生迅速变革.

trans.tran_cn: 上部结构，上层建筑，（建筑物、船等的）上面部分
trans.tran_en: a structure that is built on top of the main part of something such as a ship or building
